name: Font I made
description: You have to copy & paste each letter into one single layer. Then, you set the stroke size to something. Then you copy that layer and change the stroke size to half of the first one. THEN you need to copy it once more. Now this time, add a fill color. Then, delete stroke color thing. And now it's done. :) (That was a lot of thens) (ask in the comments if something was unclear)
